description: Number of ways n can be properly factored.
comments: a(n) = A066032(n,n-1) for n > 1; also number of ways to write n as a product with all factors <= n/2. -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 01 2012
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: 12 can be expressed as 2*6, 3*4 or 2*2*3, so a(12)=3.
author: Glen Burch (gburch(AT)erols.com)
